wikipedia_page.main: Matthew Rozeik is a composer from London, England and member of Necro Deathmort and Astrohenge.  His musical style takes in elements of electronica, metal, progressive rock and drone.

response: *Filmed by Douglas Pledger, Matthew Rozeik & Alex Gunnis
*Edited by Douglas Pledger, sound by Matthew Rozeik

In 2006 he produced the short ‘Belladonna’ with Musician Matthew Rozeik. The piece was commissioned by onedotzero and the Victoria and Albert Museum.Victoria and Albert Museum - Friday Late Commissions 2006-2007
